data.comment: Today's referee, Joao Bento, has blown to start the match.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Farense.
Goal! Fabio Abreu gives Moreirense a 1-0 lead in Moreira de Conegos.
That's a fine assist from Filipe Soares.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Farense to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
In the minute 8, Joao Bento awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Moreirenseâ€™s Lazar Rosic and play has been suspended briefly.
Joao Bento signals a throw-in for Farense, close to Moreirense's area.
In the minute 9, Lazar Rosic for Moreirense is back on the field again.
Joao Bento signals a Farense throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Farense.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Farense have a goal kick.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Free kick Farense.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Moreirense.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
In the minute 19, In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Moreirense.
Farense push forward at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas and Amine Oudrhiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Moreirense defence.
In the minute 20, Joao Bento signals a Farense throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Farense in Moreira de Conegos.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 22, Farense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Moreirense.
Brian Mansilla (Farense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 24, Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Ryan Gauld hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Farense.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 28, In Moreira de Conegos, Ryan Gauld of Farense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Moreira de Conegos Moreirense drive forward through Pedro Nuno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Fabio Nunes (Farense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 29, Joao Bento signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Jonatan Lucca of Farense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Farense's Ryan Gauld gets in a shot on goal at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Moreirense's Anthony D`Alberto has been booked in Moreira de Conegos.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 33, Can Farense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 35, Pedro Nuno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Moreirense.
Throw-in for Farense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Joao Bento awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Fabio Abreu (Moreirense) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Farense close to the penalty box.
Jonatan Lucca for Farense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
In the minute 40, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Joao Bento waits before resuming play because Lazar Rosic for Moreirense is still down.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Lazar Rosic is back on the pitch.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Farense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Joao Bento awards the home team a throw-in.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Moreirense.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joao Bento blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Farense.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Alex Pinto with Miguel Bandarra.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Alex Pinto for Farense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 47, Joao Bento signals a Moreirense throw-in in Farense's half.
Throw-in Farense.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Farense in the half of Moreirense.
Ryan Gauld of Farense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick Moreirense.
Farense are down to 10 men after Rafael Defendi has been shown a red card.
Hugo Marques is replacing Brian Mansilla for the away team.
In the minute 52, Pedro Amador (Moreirense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Farense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 53, The away team have replaced Bura with Claudio Falcao. This is the third substitution made today by Sergio Vieira.
Moreirense are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 55, Goal! Moreirense extend their lead to 2-0 through Pedro Nuno.
Alex Soares with an assist there.
In the minute 60, Fabricio Isidoro is booked for the away team.
Moreirense's Filipe Soares gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Farense defender.
Moreirense's Fabio Pacheco gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 61, Farense have a goal kick.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 64, Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Farense.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Farense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moreira de Conegos to check on Filipe Soares, who is grimacing with pain.
Pedro Henrique is on a sub for Nikola Stojiljkovic for Farense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Filipe Soares has recovered and rejoins the match in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 70, Sergio Vieira (Farense) is making a fifth substitution, with Alvarinho replacing Cassio Scheid.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Moreirense make their first substitution with Felipe Pires replacing Lucas Rodrigues.
Farense's Alvarinho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 72, Joao Bento awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Farense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 76, Farense to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Farense.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
Free kick Farense.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Farense defence as Felipe Pires fires in a strike for Moreirense.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Moreirense are coming forward and Pedro Amador gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 83, Farense have a goal kick.
Ricardo Soares (Moreirense) has taken off Filipe Soares who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ibrahima Camara is the replacement.
Ricardo Soares is making the team's third substitution at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas with Matheus Silva replacing Anthony D`Alberto.
In the minute 85, Fabio Abreu's header is off-target for Moreirense.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
In the minute 86, Amine Oudrhiri (Farense) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 88, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Joao Bento.
Pedro Nuno for Moreirense drives towards goal at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Moreirense.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Goncalo Franco is on a sub for Alex Soares for Moreirense.
Joao Bento awards the away team a throw-in.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Farense.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Moreira de Conegos, Farense push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Farense to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Joao Bento signals a free kick to Farense.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
Corner awarded to Farense.
Joao Bento awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Farense have an attacking throw-in.
Can Farense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
Joao Bento awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick Moreirense.
Moreirense push upfield but Joao Bento quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Farense in the half of Moreirense.
Joao Bento blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Miguel Bandarra is booked for the away team.
